name: Artie
headline: Software that streams data from databases to warehouses in real-time
description: Artie is software that streams data from databases to data warehouses in real-time. Today, most companies run their ETL process every few hours or overnight, so their data warehouse is always out of date; with Artie, the warehouse always has live production data.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:open-source; industry:data-engineering; industry:enterprise-software; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jacqueline Cheong, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at Artie. Building a real-time database replication platform. Previously a software investor at Balyasny and responsible for a ~$300M software book.

founders.name: Robin Tang, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ Artie. Software engineer with a background in distributed systems and designing for high throughput and low latency. Currently working on providing real-time data replication by leveraging data streams and CDC.

# Replication without Complication
[Book a Demo](https://www.artie.com/</contact>)[Request Access](https://www.artie.com/<#>)
Effortlessly sync your database with data warehouses in real-time. Fully managed change data capture (CDC) that just works
![Apkudo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c8d7ab35fd5d2907baed_apkudo.svg)![Apkudo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c8d7ab35fd5d2907baed_apkudo.svg)
![Tatango](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787cf1e3ac991e59dd59acf_tatango.svg)![Tatango](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787cf1e3ac991e59dd59acf_tatango.svg)
![Stitch](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c89f1a41c0d74fc10a9c_stitch.svg)![Stitch](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c89f1a41c0d74fc10a9c_stitch.svg)
![Papaya](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c8893dffd93ab46b3f2a_papaya.svg)![Papaya](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c8893dffd93ab46b3f2a_papaya.svg)
![Substack](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/679f96aaf9807ab8146fb167_substack.svg)![Substack](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/679f96aaf9807ab8146fb167_substack.svg)
![Keep](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c83f4a00740c499cc8cf_keep.svg)![Keep](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c83f4a00740c499cc8cf_keep.svg)
![Indigov](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c82a0ede84e691c27c74_indigov.svg)![Indigov](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c82a0ede84e691c27c74_indigov.svg)
![Routable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c7fd2452d2fc02876d24_routable.svg)![Routable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c7fd2452d2fc02876d24_routable.svg)
Where we sit
## Connect
Securely connect to databases of your choice. Artie makes the setup seamless, so you’re ready to start replicating in minutes
Database integrations:
PostgresMySQLMongoDBSQL ServerDocumentDBOracleDynamoDB
Secure your connection with:
SSH tunnelingIP whitelistingAWS PrivateLink
![Securely connect to databases of your choice. Artie makes the setup seamless, so you’re ready to start replicating in minutes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6783ed06b0136cc2b8a9e3a1_connect.png)
## Configure
Select tables to replicate and enable “History Mode” for slowly changing dimension (SCD) tables to audit and maintain reliable historical records. Artie’s intuitive dashboard makes configuration effortless at any scale
Manage deployments with:
DashboardTerraform
![Select tables to replicate and enable “History Mode” for slowly changing dimension \(SCD\) tables to audit and maintain reliable historical records. Artie’s intuitive dashboard makes configuration effortless at any scale](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/67af14f5d1cf3cb30732e372_configure.png)
## Deploy
Connect destinations and deploy. Fine-tune pipelines with advanced settings for reliable, efficient data flow into destinations
Destination integrations:
SnowflakeBigQueryRedshiftS3 PostgresSQL ServerDatabricks
Deploy environments:
CloudIn your VPC
Advanced settings:
Hard column deletesCustom flush intervalsSoft row deletesSnowflake Eco Modeand more
![Connect destinations and deploy. Fine-tune pipelines with advanced settings for reliable, efficient data flow into destinations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6783ed1da74c9151c1a30000_deploy.png)
## Monitor
Track pipeline performance in real-time with table-level metrics. Get automatic alerts, set up custom monitors, and integrate with Datadog for even more control
Available metrics:
UsageIngestion lagRow lagReplication slotWarehouse efficiencyand many more
Alerts:
Threshold-basedAnomaly-based
Notifications for:
Schema & table changes
![Track pipeline performance in real-time with table-level metrics. Get automatic alerts, set up custom monitors, and integrate with Datadog for even more control](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6789588aa1e8a642e61a94bd_monitor.png)
## Delivering more than just data pipelines
### The backboneof your data strategy
### Faster time to value
### Engineering timewhere it counts
Build your roadmap with confidence - Artie is the foundational pipeline that you can rely on at terabyte scale
Deliver insights faster and power data products with sub-minute latency
Free your engineering team from pipeline maintenance and focus on building products that delight customers
![Ball](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/678002cddeed5853ba2195b8_ball.webp)
![Papaya](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c8893dffd93ab46b3f2a_papaya.svg)![Papaya](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c8893dffd93ab46b3f2a_papaya.svg)
70%
reduction in maintenance overhead
![Quotation mark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/67797433a17dc0ede2453fe3_quotation%20mark.svg)
Artie has been an absolute game-changer for our CDC ETL process. Before integrating Artie into our workflow, we struggled with inefficiencies and time-consuming maintenance that drained our resources. Since adopting Artie, we've experienced a remarkable boost in productivity and a significant reduction in time required to maintain our ETL processes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/678e80cc8f311e1075e250f1_Daniel%20Clendenning.webp)
Daniel Clendenning, Senior Software Engineer
[Read full case study](https://www.artie.com/</customer-stories/papaya-streamlined-etl-and-scaled-bill-payment-efficiency-with-cdc>)
![Substack](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/679f96aaf9807ab8146fb167_substack.svg)![Substack](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/679f96aaf9807ab8146fb167_substack.svg)
98%+
reduction in latency
![Quotation mark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/67797433a17dc0ede2453fe3_quotation%20mark.svg)
Internal sentiment is extremely positive. Our A/B testing framework measures much faster and we have higher data integrity now. This means the whole company can move faster and make decisions quicker. Artie is business critical and our day to day would be significantly tougher without it.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/678e80e1754089702369bc30_Mike%20Cohen.webp)
Mike Cohen, Head of AI & MLE
[Read full case study](https://www.artie.com/</customer-stories/substack>)
![Tatango](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787cf1e3ac991e59dd59acf_tatango.svg)![Tatango](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787cf1e3ac991e59dd59acf_tatango.svg)
10TB+
worth of data freed
![Quotation mark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/67797433a17dc0ede2453fe3_quotation%20mark.svg)
Artie is powering our most important tables today. The product and engineering teams at Tatango are able to provide near real-time sending and performance related analytics to our customers, enabling them to focus on what matters most; fundraise.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/678e80eccffdbb5f55684c68_Matt%20Powers.webp)
Matt Powers, CTO
[Read full case study](https://www.artie.com/</customer-stories/tatango>)
![Routable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c7fd2452d2fc02876d24_routable.svg)![Routable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/6787c7fd2452d2fc02876d24_routable.svg)
95%+
reduction in latency
![Quotation mark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/67797433a17dc0ede2453fe3_quotation%20mark.svg)
Discovering Artie has been a game-changer in our data management strategy. In an arena where real-time access to data can define market leadership, their tool bridges the gap between our database and data warehouse with seamless, zero-latency synchronization. It's not just about speed; the fidelity of our data remains uncompromised with no unnecessary data type.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6777b5ab6612ab0c7b0d8b43/678e80f823f41020000d6335_Jason%20Hodson.webp)
Jason Hodson, Director of Data & Analytics
[Read full case study](https://www.artie.com/</customer-stories/routable-stops-fraudulent-transactions-faster-with-artie>)
Next
## Purpose-built for Engineers, Loved by Teams
### History mode
Audit log tables (SCD Type 2) to maintain a detailed, audit-ready history of table changes
### Real-time analytics
Monitor pipeline metrics in Artie and manage them seamlessly in Datadog
### Flexible deployments
Cloud or on-premise (BYOC), built for security and regulated industries
### Terraform-friendly
Prefer to have infrastructure as code? We've got you covered
### Schema drift support
Artie adapts to schema changes and keeps teams aligned with notifications
### Non-intrusive backfills
Enjoy non-disruptive, online backfills with flexible, parallel strategies and replica support
### Eventual consistency
Built on Kafka, Artie ensures reliable, up-to-date data with eventual consistency
### Fault tolerance
Self-healing pipelines with schema inference and Kafka ensure resilience
### New feature
COMING SOON
Stay tuned...
## We move your data securely without storing it
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/67aaf39e6697d156fa29080e_rectangle.webp)
Artie ensures your data security by never storing processing data. We read directly from your database’s replication log and deliver it securely to your warehouse, with encryption in transit and at rest
[Learn about our data security](https://www.artie.com/<https:/trust.artie.com>)
![AICPA badge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/6799b6f02a7cdfe29a9a25fb_aicpa-badge.png)![HIPAA badge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/6799b6f045c81bc20f9a0430_hipaa-badge.png)
![How Artie works](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67655f409fa0e15fcc650c53/6793bc4e62a6577fc6755228_artie-how.png)
## How Artie streams your data
1.
Connect your databases and warehouses, and select the tables you’d like to replicate
2.
CDC events stream from your source database into Kafka
3.
Artie reads Kafka events and loads changes into a staging table
4.
Schema changes are automatically detected and applied
5.
Data types are reconciled, and the staging table merges into the target table
6.
Artie commits Kafka offsets after a successful merge to ensure consistency
## 10x better pipelines.Today.

generated_description:
**Artie: Your Real-Time Data Solution**

Founded in 2023 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Artie is a San Francisco-based startup that's redefining how data is handled. Its mission? To stream data from databases to data warehouses in real-time, ensuring that businesses always have access to live production data rather than outdated snapshots that come from traditional ETL processes, which typically run every few hours or overnight.

### The Problem with Traditional ETL

Many organizations still rely on these legacy ETL processes, but Artie aims to change that. By using Artie, companies can eliminate the lag between data collection and accessibility, allowing for a much more agile response to changing business needs.

### How It Works

Artie's service offers a fully managed Change Data Capture (CDC) system that ensures your data flows smoothly and accurately from one point to another. Here are the key functionalities:

1. **Connect**: Easily integrate with various databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and more.
2. **Configure**: Utilize a user-friendly dashboard to select tables and enable features like "History Mode" for auditing historical data.
3. **Deploy**: Seamlessly direct data to various destinations including Snowflake and BigQuery.
4. **Monitor**: Keep track of pipeline performance in real time and receive alerts for any anomalies.

Instead of housing your data, Artie reads directly from your database’s replication log, which means enhanced security and compliance with various regulations.

### The Team and Vision

With a small but dedicated team of seven, guided by Group Partner Jared Friedman, Artie embodies the nimbleness needed in today's fast-paced tech environment. The company has strategically positioned itself within the developer tools and data engineering sectors, taking a strong stance on open-source principles.

### Why Choose Artie?

- **Reduced Latency**: Artie claims to offer 98% or greater reductions in data latency, enabling decision-making at the speed of business.
- **Cost and Resource Efficiency**: Utilizing Artie can lead to a significant decrease in maintenance overhead, freeing your engineering team to focus on product development rather than plumbing.
- **Robust Customer Support**: Artie is already being linked to real success stories at companies like Tatango and Routable, where teams report substantial improvements after implementing Artie.

In short, if you're using outdated ETL processes and looking to make a leap into real-time data management, Artie is a fresh option that may be worth exploring. For more information, visit [Artie's website](https://www.artie.com/).
